extracted_playbook.title: Temporarily isolate or block internet access
extracted_playbook.description: Temporarily isolate or block internet access to and from systems hosting Accellion FTA.

extracted_playbook.title: Assess system for malicious activity
extracted_playbook.description: Assess the system for evidence of malicious activity including the IOCs, and obtain a snapshot or forensic disk image of the system for subsequent investigation.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Accellion FTA
extracted_playbook.description: Update Accellion FTA to version FTA_9_12_432 or later.

extracted_playbook.title: Evaluate migration solutions
extracted_playbook.description: Evaluate potential solutions for migration to a supported file-sharing platform after completing appropriate testing.

extracted_playbook.title: Conduct audit of user accounts
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct an audit of Accellion FTA user accounts for any unauthorized changes, and consider resetting user passwords.

extracted_playbook.title: Reset security tokens
extracted_playbook.description: Reset any security tokens on the system, including the 'W1' encryption token, which may have been exposed through SQL injection.

extracted_playbook.title: Deploy automated software update tools
extracted_playbook.description: Deploy automated software update tools to ensure that third-party software on all systems is running the most recent security updates provided by the software vendor.
